fixes.name: WATM(d) X
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = SUMX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)', 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DTM])
VAR Denominator = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD X])
RETURN DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau SUM of a product into SUMX for the numerator and SUM for the denominator. All column references were converted to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format and wrapped in VARs with a final RETURN using DIVIDE to handle division safely.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregations (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
